articles.title: Dinosaur Found In Australia Was 2 Stories Tall And The Length Of A Basketball Court - North Country Public Radio
articles.description: "Cooper," a gargantuan dinosaur that roamed the Outback, is the first of its kind found outside South America. The new species had a long neck and tail, as well as four legs, and ate plants.
articles.content:
Researchers in Australia have confirmed the discovery of Australia's largest dinosaur species ever found.
Australotitan cooperensis was about 80 to 100 feet long and 16 to 21 feet tall at its hip. I… [+4084 chars]

articles.title: Colombia vs. Argentina, EN VIVO ONLINE: dónde y cómo verlo por internet en streaming y TV - Goal.com
articles.description: Lionel Messi's Argentina and Neymar's Brazil are among the high profile South American teams competing to qualify to the 2022 FIFA World Cup in Qatar. The top four qualify directly and the fifth-place team will advance to an intercontinental playoff.

articles.description: A source leaked tax data to ProPublica on the wealthiest people in the US, including Jeff Bezos, Elon Musk, Rupert Murdoch and Mark Zuckerberg.
